attachments.bonuses: Wielder can can Prepare once to gain 4 damage on next attack. After firing, weapon is out of ammo

attachments.name: Paired Weapons
attachments.bonuses: Applied to 2 weapons at a time. -1 Advantage required to hit with secondary weapon when two-weapon-fighting with this pair of weapons

attachments.name: Set Trigger
attachments.bonuses: Adds automatic 1 Success and 1 Threat to first combat check made with this weapon each encounter

attachments.name: Underslung Scattergun
attachments.bonuses: Can fire with following profile: Ranged (Heavy), Dam 6, Short, Blast 5, Knockdown, Limited Ammo 1. Adds Cumbersome +1 to weapon

attachments.name: Arakyd 900 Gene-Lock
attachments.bonuses: Weapon only works when wielded by owner
attachments.modificationOptions: Self-destruct if unauthorized user tries to use it, inflicting 1 critical injury

attachments.name: "Bantha's Eye" Laser Sight
attachments.bonuses: Gain 1 automatic Advantage on successful hit
attachments.appliesTo: Ranged (Light) or Ranged (Heavy) without Blast quality

attachments.name: H9 Pistol Grip
attachments.bonuses: Weapon's skill changes to Ranged (Light), but add 1 setback to combat checks while firing 1 handed. Range reduced to Medium if longer
attachments.appliesTo: Ranged (Heavy) blaster rifle, carbine, or slugthrower

attachments.name: "Final Word" Secondary Missile System
attachments.bonuses: Weapon can fire rockets or missles. Uses missile's profile and requires Gunnery skill to use. Adds Cumbersome +2, +3 Encumbrance

attachments.name: Model 2 Wrist Mount
attachments.bonuses: Weapon can be worn on the wrist, so hands can be used without interference.

attachments.name: Poison Reservoir
attachments.bonuses: Can store 1 dose of poison, maneuver to douse the blade in poison, lasts until next turn.

attachments.name: Blaster Suppressor
attachments.bonuses: Adds 2 setback to Perception or Vigilance checks to locate concealed shooter

attachments.name: Custom Grip
attachments.bonuses: Remove 1 setback from all combat checks made with this weapon. Any other than the owner isntead adds 2 setback.

attachments.name: Enhanced XCiter
attachments.bonuses: Decrease Crit rating by 1 (min 1). May spend 2 despair from any combat check using the weapon to cause it to explode, destroying it and inflicting an automatic critical injury on the wielder

attachments.name: Gyrostabilizer
attachments.bonuses: Decrease Cumbersome by 1

attachments.name: Integrated Scanner
attachments.bonuses: Weapon incorporates a general scanner. Wielder adds automatic 2 Advantage to Initiative checks while weapon is drawn

attachments.name: Optimized Energy Cell
attachments.bonuses: Any time weapon could be made to run out of ammo, it requires 1 additional threat to have that effect apply.

attachments.name: Overcharged Actuating Module
attachments.bonuses: +1 Damage. May spend 2 Threat from any combat check to have it become damaged 1 step

attachments.name: Rapid-Recharge XCiter
attachments.bonuses: Weapon gains Auto-Fire and Inaccurate 3

attachments.name: Removed Safety Features
attachments.bonuses: Add 1 boost to first combat check during an encounter. Can spend 2 Threat or 1 Despair to have the weapon misfire, running out of ammo and inflicting 4 strain on the wielder
attachments.appliesTo: Any Ranged (Light) or Ranged (Heavy) that could have these features to remove

attachments.name: Secondary Ion Blaster
attachments.bonuses: Enabled the weapon to fire with the following profile: Ranged (Heavy), Dam 10, Crit 5, Short, Disorient 5, Ion. Adds Cumbersome 1 and +1 Encumbrance

attachments.name: Sonic Scope
attachments.bonuses: Character may observe and target enemies who are hidden by solid objects that the weapon can penetrate.

attachments.name: Stripped Down
attachments.bonuses: -1 Encumbrance. 1 setback to Perception checks to find weapon when hidden.

attachments.name: Under-Barrel Grapnel Launcher
attachments.bonuses: As an action, character can make an average Ranged (Light) check to secure the grappling hook to an object within medium range. On success, as an action, he can reel in the cord. Can pull another character along with an average Athletics check to avoid losing his grip. +2 Encumbrance
attachments.appliesTo: Any Ranged (Light) or Ranged (Heavy) that could logically fit one

attachments.name: Vibro-Bayonet
attachments.bonuses: Enables the weapon to be used in melee with the following profile: Dam 1, Crit 2, Engaged, Pierce 2, Inaccurate 1, Vicious 1
attachments.appliesTo: Any Ranged (Heavy) weapon that could logically mount one

attachments.name: Marked-Target Firing Lock
attachments.bonuses: Wielder may designate a target as an incidental while performing the Aim Maneuver. Once target has been designated, weapon can't be fired at other targets. All combat checks to attack designated target cancel 1 additional Threat. Only one target can be designated at a time. Releasing the lock is a maneuver
attachments.appliesTo: Any ranged weapon without Blast or Auto-Fire

attachments.name: Shock Pulse Emitter
attachments.bonuses: Grants Stun +2

attachments.name: Under-Barrel Micro-Rocket Rack
attachments.bonuses: Weapon can fire 1 loaded Micro-Rocket. Adds Cumbersome +1. +3 Encumbrance
attachments.modificationOptions: 2x Mount 1 additional micro-rocket, 2x Remove 1 setback from checks to fire micro-rockets

attachments.name: Beam Splitter
attachments.bonuses: Grants Blast with value equal to half weapon's damage (round up). Reduce range by 1 (min Engaged)
attachments.appliesTo: Any energy weapon without Blast quality

attachments.name: Built-in Blaster Sight
attachments.bonuses: Remove 1 setback added by Called Shot use of Aim maneuver from Ranged (Light) and Ranged (Heavy) checks

attachments.name: Galven Pattern Resequencing
attachments.bonuses: +1 damage. Automatic 2 threat to all combat checks.
attachments.appliesTo: Blaster pistols and Heavy blaster pistols

attachments.name: Cortosis Weave
attachments.bonuses: Gain cortosis quality

attachments.name: Enhanced Optics Suite
attachments.bonuses: Remove up to 2 setback to all Perception, Surveillance, Vigilance, and Combat checks due to vision obstructions

attachments.name: Heating System
attachments.bonuses: -1 difficulty to Resilience checks to resist extreme cold. Remove up to 2 setback to checks due to extreme cold
attachments.appliesTo: Any armor that covers entire body and can be sealed

attachments.name: Optical Camouflage System
attachments.bonuses: Upgrade stealth checks twice
attachments.appliesTo: Any, but nearly uselss on laminate and plastoid heavy armor (too bulky)

attachments.name: Strength Enhancing System
attachments.bonuses: +1 Brawn (does not increase soak or wound)
attachments.appliesTo: Laminate or similar full-body hard armor suits

attachments.name: Superior Armor Customization
attachments.bonuses: Superior Quality

attachments.name: Thermal Shielding System
attachments.bonuses: -1 difficulty to Resilience checks to resist fire and extreme heat. Remove up to 2 setback to checks due to extreme heat or fire
attachments.appliesTo: Any armor that covers entire body and can be sealed

attachments.name: Vacuum Sealed
attachments.bonuses: Armor is sealed against vacuum, providing up to 10 minutes of air/insulation. Also protects against adverse atmospheric conditions

attachments.name: Smartmed 2000 Integrated Med-System
attachments.bonuses: Once per session, user may activate as incidental to inject as if 1 stimpack. All medicine checks to heal wearer gain 1 boost
attachments.modificationOptions: 2x All successful Medicine checks to heal wearer's wounds heal +1
attachments.appliesTo: Any armor covering most of the body

attachments.name: VX Hands-free Weapon System
attachments.bonuses: Mount 1 weapon on the armor, allowing wearer to aim/fire it without hands. Can mount any Ranged (Light) or Ranged (Heavy) with Encumbrance 4 or less. Weapon is modified, using 1 mod slot.
attachments.appliesTo: Any with sufficient place to mount weapon to

attachments.name: Built-in Comlink
attachments.bonuses: Long range comlink integrated into helmet

attachments.name: Omniscan 3 Integrated Scanner
attachments.bonuses: While wearing helmet, user has a general purpose scanner, and adds 1 boost to Perception checks made to detect movement or hidden enemies

attachments.name: MB-7 "Ranger" Range Finder
attachments.bonuses: Innate Talent (Sniper)

attachments.name: "Accu-Strike" Integrated Targeting Computer
attachments.bonuses: +1 boost to all Ranged attacks at Long or Extreme range

attachments.name: Threat Monitor
attachments.bonuses: Adds automatic 1 Advantage to Initiative checks

attachments.name: Amphibious Modification
attachments.bonuses: Armor provides enough oxygen for up to 5 hours of submersion or airless environment (does not protect against vacuum). User removes 1 setback from physical checks due to underwater conditions.
attachments.appliesTo: Any armor that could have an air tank attached

attachments.name: Custom Fit
attachments.bonuses: Removes 1 setback from Athletics and Stealth checks while wearing
attachments.modificationOptions: 1x Remove 1 setback from Athletics and Stealth checks

attachments.name: Integrated Ascension Gear
attachments.bonuses: Same as under-barrel grapnel, but only requires an Easy Athletics check to hold on when pulling along another character

attachments.name: Integrated Slicer Gear
attachments.bonuses: Wearer counts as having Slicer gear that can be controlled by gesturing or vocalizing. Add 1 setback to all checks made by others to identify that the character is slicing.

attachments.name: Ion Shielding
attachments.bonuses: Increase soak by 3 vs Ion

attachments.name: Radiation Shielding
attachments.bonuses: Add 2 boost to Resilience checks to resist radiation
attachments.appliesTo: Laminate, Heavy Battle Armor, or any other that can be fully sealed

attachments.name: Reinforced Gauntlets
attachments.bonuses: Character can use gauntlets as a weapon with following profile: Melee, Dam 1, Crit 4, Engaged, Disorient 3

attachments.name: Self-Repair Systems
attachments.bonuses: Once per encounter, as a maneuver, wearer can have the armor attempt to repair itself or provide assistance to a character repairing it. Counts as having Intellect 2 and Mechanics 2. No cost to repair the armor.
attachments.appliesTo: Any with ranged or melee defense 1 or higher

attachments.name: Integrated Holsters
attachments.bonuses: +4 Encumbrance. Character can holster up to 2 weapons of Encumbrance 3 or lower in the armor, which do not count toward the character's Encumbrance
attachments.modificationOptions: 2x Add 1 setback to Perception checks to find weapons stored in the armor, 3x holster 1 additional weapon, 1x Innate Talent (Quick Draw)

attachments.name: Micro-Rocket Armor Mounting
attachments.bonuses: User can fire 1 loaded micro-rocket without needing a maneuver to draw. +3 Encumbrance
attachments.modificationOptions: 5x Mount 1 additional micro-rocket, 1x Remove 1 setback from checks to fire rockets

attachments.name: Repulsor Assisted Lifting
attachments.bonuses: +5 Brawn for determining Encumbrance threshold
attachments.appliesTo: Laminate and other full-body hard armor suits

attachments.name: Tracking System
attachments.bonuses: Upgrade ability of checks to track a designated target once. Wearer may designate a target with a maneuver

gear.name: Comlink (Short Range)
gear.description: Allows communication up to low orbit

gear.name: Comlink (Long Range)
gear.description: Allows communication up to high orbit or across system

gear.name: Holo-Messenger
gear.description: Usually only used for formal things and when dealing with the wealthy. Creates holographic recordings or transmissions that can be played back as a small projection

gear.name: X-500 Portable Holonet Relay
gear.description: Portable WiFi stick.

gear.name: Collar-Amp
gear.description: Little button that acts as a megaphone, allowing wearer to be heard at long or extreme ranges

gear.name: Shockhold Hardened Comm
gear.description: Satellite uplink for planet-wide or planet-to-orbit communications. Automatic 2 failure to checks made to decode and understand its transmissions, automatic 2 success to any checks made to broadcast through a com jammer

gear.name: Pioneer Long-Range Transceiver
gear.description: Can transmit messages up to 100 light years

gear.name: Electronics Whistler
gear.description: Encryption module attaches to comlink or hypertransceiver. Requires a formidable check and sophisticated equipment to decode message. Without equipment, decoding is impossible

gear.name: Remote DVI Activator (Basic)
gear.description: Activate vehicle/ship at range. Works up to 5km. Only activates vehicle, some can remotely pilot vehicle, but this requires a Daunting Piloting check.

gear.name: Remote DVI Activator (Advanced)
gear.description: Activate vehicle/ship at range. Works up to 1 parsec. Vehicle will fly to user, some can remotely pilot vehicle, but this requires a Daunting Piloting check.

gear.name: 3-MAL Secure Comlink
gear.description: Transmits up to medium planetary range. Encryption adds 1 setback to checks made to intercept and unscramble signal. Monitoring a clear frequency on a civilized world can add 2 boost to Knowledge checks related to current events/conditions

gear.name: DH77 Headcomm
gear.description: Transmits up to medium planetary range. Encryption adds 3 setback to attempts to intercept/unscramble.

gear.name: Atgar Artillery Remote
gear.description: Can link 1 Gunnery weapon with hard Computers check (average if weapon is Atgar SpaceDefense). Linked weapon gains Inaccurate 2 and can be fired remotely from up to medium range

gear.name: Neurotoxin
gear.description: Single dose requires average Resilience check, larger doses are hard. On failure, subject takes 5 wounds, each threat inflicts 1 strain, despair can be spent to force second check in next round

gear.name: Anesthetic
gear.description: Single dose requires average Resilience check, larger doses are hard. On failure, subject takes 5 strain, 1 or 2 threat forfeits next free maneuver, 3 or more threat staggers next round, despair can be spent to force second check in next round

gear.name: Neuroparalytic
gear.description: Any dose requires hard Resilience check. On failure, subject is stunned 3 rounds, each threat inflicts 1 strain, despaire can be spent to force second check in next round

gear.name: Dendriton Toxin
gear.description: Any dose requires a daunting Resilience check. On failure, subject suffers 1 strain at end of next turn, 3 strain at end of subsequent turn, and 5 strain at end of turn after that (ignoring soak). Also suffers 1 setback to any check attempted while under the effects, and each Threat generated on those checks inflicts 1 additoinal strain. May spend 1 despair on initial Resilience check to add 1 additional check against 5 strain.

gear.name: Dioxis Gas
gear.description: Single dose requires hard Resilience check, 2 or more requires Daunting. On failure, subject suffers 5 wounds (ignoring soak). Each Threat generated inflicts 2 strain. Lingers in the air up to 3 rounds, unless dissipated.

gear.name: Raquor Venom
gear.description: Any dose requires Daunting Resilience check. On failure, subject is staggered for 2 rounds. Each threat generated inflicts 2 strain on subject. May spend 1 despair to Immobilize target for 2 rounds. Aerosolized versions only have difficulty of Hard.

gear.name: Electrobinoculars
gear.description: User can see normally in low and extremely bright light, magnify targets up to ten km away. Can remove 1 setback imposed due to long range or poor light.

gear.name: General Purpose Scanner
gear.description: Scans/picks up on all kinds of things (life forms, metal, motion sensing, comlink intercepting, etc.)

gear.name: Hand Scanner
gear.description: Similar to above, or like medical scanners, that kinda thing

gear.name: Macrobinoculars
gear.description: Regular binoculars

gear.name: Scanner Goggles
gear.description: User can see normally in dark conditions

gear.name: Surveillance Tagger
gear.description: Tracking device. Longer range costs more

gear.name: Holoscanner
gear.description: -2 Difficulty to Perception or Vigilance checks to discover concealed items on a person or in a container or vehicle. Can't scan things with higher encumbrance than itself.

gear.name: Mark 6 Combat Scanner
gear.description: Functions as a general-purpose scanner with 100km line of sight, 360-degree view, and integrated communications. Allows user to see normally in dark conditions, can be set to track motion, heat, and metal, adds 2 setback to any checks made to decode and understand transmissions from it

gear.name: Mark 10 Demolitions Scanner
gear.description: Allows user to detect concealed explosives, adds 1 boost to checks to do so.

gear.name: Recon Remote
gear.description: Little floaty balls that go recon stuff up to 20km away. Can run for 24 hours on a charge

gear.name: HSI-280 Hyperwave Signal Interceptor
gear.description: Can covertly listen in on FTL communications within 10 light year range. Can also get several minutes warning of ship exiting hyperspace or give a fairly good idea of general course and direction

gear.name: Armascan Weapon Detection Goggles
gear.description: Wearer adds up to 2 boost to Perception checks when attempting to find a concealed weapon on a person

gear.name: Enhancescan Long-Range Terrain Scanner
gear.description: Can map an area within Long range. Requires average Computers check. Map generated gives 1 boost +1 success per 2 Advantage on the Computers check, to Survival checks made to navigate using the map.

gear.name: Ground-Penetrating Sensor Pack
gear.description: Basically ground-penetrating radar, but Star Wars

gear.name: ILF-6500 Life Form Scanner
gear.description: Can track up to 24 targets at once, in a radius of 500m, categorize and rank them according to threat level, and send updates to user's datapad or sound an alarm. Requires average Survival, or hard Knowledge (Education) or Computers check to ensure it is properly calibrated.

gear.name: Hunting Goggles
gear.description: +1 boost to Perception checks to locate prey, -2 setback due to concealment/darness/fog/etc. on Ranged (Light) and Ranged (Heavy) checks

gear.name: Low-Feedback Scanner
gear.description: Passive scanner that can't be detected. Can detect radiation sources of Silhouette 1 or larger within short range, life forms in medium, power sources in long, and comms in extreme. Detection range increases by 1 for every Silhouette size greater than 1 the target has

gear.name: SE-Vigilant Automated Sensor
gear.description: Small sensor-on-a-stick that transmits to designated comlink/datapad/computers/droids

gear.name: Bacta Tank
gear.description: Injured character heals 1 wound per 2 hours, incapacitated character heals 1 wound per 6 hours. Every 24 hours, character can attempt Resilience check to remove 1 critical injury

gear.name: Emergency Medpac
gear.description: Allows for basic first aid. User can attempt to heal with medicine check without penalty

gear.name: Medpac
gear.description: More complete than emergency medpac. Allows user to perform relatively complicated medical procedures in the field. Can attempt to heal others with medicine check without penalty, and gains 1 boost on all attempts. Provides 1 stimpack per scene

gear.name: Stimpack
gear.description: Single-use. Maneuver to recover 5 wounds. Each consecutive one used within 24 hours reduces amount healed by 1 (so max 5 used in any 24 hour period).

gear.name: Synthskin
gear.description: Can be used to treat cuts and bruises

gear.name: IRAPS Cerebral Stabilizer
gear.description: Can be applied to character suffering from Bleeding Out or The End is Nigh critical injuries within 1 round of them occuring, or a character who has died during the current round. Applying requires and average Medicine check. Once applied, character is stabilized. If he died, he is brought back to life and counts as suffering a Gruesome Injury critical injury. Otherwise, effects of the critical injury are cancelled (though he still suffers from the injury itself)

gear.name: Military Medpac
gear.description: If user has no ranks in Medicine, he counts as having 1 rank while using this.

gear.name: ECM-598 Medical Backpack
gear.description: Includes a clinic's worth of medical gear, including a stretcher. Works like a medpac, but gives 1 boost to Medicine checks while using it, and reduces difficulty of Medicine checks to heal Critical Injuries by 1 (min Easy)

gear.name: Nullicaine
gear.description: Application requires easy Medicine check. Choose 1 easy, average, or hard Critical Injury target is suffering. On success, target suffers 3 straing and ignores chosen Critical Innjury. Only affects living creatures.

gear.name: Stimstick
gear.description: Small piece of wood. Chewing removes 1 setback from Discipline, Perception, Resilience, and Vigilance checks to stay awake or notice something, due to fatigue or lack of sleep until end of encounter. Character suffers 1 strain

gear.name: Military Trumapac
gear.description: Medpac that only works for treating Critical Injuries

gear.name: XV-3B Veterinary Kit
gear.description: Medpac for animals. 1 boost to Medicine, Survival, and Knowledge (Xenology) checks to analyze or treat animals

gear.name: XV-09 Chemical Restraint Harness
gear.description: Like a restraining bolt for animals. Requires hard survival check to mount, or average with successful Knowledge (Xenology) check. Grants 2 boost to Survival checks to control animal. Animal gains 1 boost to Discipline checks.

gear.name: Arm Mod V/VI
gear.description: V gives +1 brawn, VI gives +1 agility. If replacing both arms, must use same model. Bonuses don't stack

gear.name: Brain Implant
gear.description: Gives +1 intelligence. Includes comlink and computer access link

gear.name: Eyes
gear.description: Gives +1 Vigilance and Perception

gear.name: Leg Mod II/III
gear.description: II gives +1 brawn, III gives + 1 agility. Must replace both legs to get bonus.

gear.name: Weapon
gear.description: Arm includes light blaster pistol that can't be removed, dropped, or disarmed

gear.name: Cyberscanner Limb
gear.description: Arm includes a basic medium range scanner. Displays data on a holo-projector above the user's hand and can show nearby motion, life-forms, energy signatures, and other common targets as desired

gear.name: Immune Implant
gear.description: Gives +1 Resilience

gear.name: Implant Armor
gear.description: Armor plates fitted under the skin. Gives +1 soak

gear.name: Prosthetic Limb
gear.description: No bonus, just replaces missing part

gear.name: Prosthetic Organ
gear.description: No bonus, just replaces missing part

gear.name: Appraiser's Eye
gear.description: Automatic 1 Advantage on Negotiation and Streetwise checks to buy/sell items

gear.name: Cybernetic Cavity
gear.description: Provides 1 rank of Hidden Storage Talent

gear.name: Digital Lockpick
gear.description: Provides 1 rank of Bypass Security Talent

gear.name: Adrenal Implant
gear.description: Provides 1 rank of Rapid Recovery Talent

gear.name: Cybernetic Reflexes
gear.description: Provides 1 rank of Rapid Reaction Talent

gear.name: Cybernetic Respirator
gear.description: Permanently provides charcater with benefits of Respirator and Breath Bask, and 1 rank of Blooded Talent

gear.name: Gank Comm Implant
gear.description: Characters can communicate silently with each other up to several kilometers. Must share a language. Communication is not auditory

gear.name: Implanted Cyberjack
gear.description: Once per check, a character with it may suffer 2 strain to decrease difficulty of a Computers check to disable a security device or slice into a computer system by 1.

gear.name: Neuromachine Interface
gear.description: Allows user to control vehicle equipped with the linked control device with a thought. While piloting this vehicle, character may use his Coordination skill in place of the appropriate Pilot skill.

gear.name: Q-22 Retinal Tracker
gear.description: Provides automatic 1 Threat on Gunnery and Ranged (Heavy) checks

gear.name: Repulsor Fist
gear.description: Provides 1 rank of Defensive Stance Talent, counts as a Brawl weapon with Dam 8, Crit 3, Concussive 1, and Slow-Firing 2

gear.name: CAAF-2 Avionics Interface
gear.description: Characters with at least 1 rank in a Pilot skill can +1 to that skill when flying an appropriate ship. Generaly only works with Airspeeders and Starships

gear.name: Biofeedback Regulator
gear.description: Increases character's cybernetic implant cap by 2. Does not count towards implant cap. Cannot be installed on droids, and a character can only have 1 installed.

gear.name: Escape Circuit
gear.description: Can only be installed on droids. Droids so equipped can resist a restraining bolt with an easy Discipline check and may spend 2 Advantage from such a check to overload the bolt, making it entirely useless.

gear.name: Networked Slicing Uplink
gear.description: Can only be installed on droids. Counts as a set of slicer gear. When the droid is slicing or assisting with slicing, add 1 setback to Computers checks to identify the slicer based on these activities.

gear.name: Neural Recorder
gear.description: Allows the user to make an easy Discipline check to recall any information experienced while the recorder was running. Character can copy recordings to external storage.

gear.name: Surge Override Switch
gear.description: Once per encounter as an action, character can make in average Discipline check. On success, can activate any number of cybernetic implants that have been overloaded by weapons with the Ion quality, the Overcharge talent, or similar effects. Suffer 2 strain for each implant reactivated this way. Cannot be disabled or overloaded.

gear.name: Loaded Chance Cube
gear.description: May add up to 2 boost to Deception checks when gambling. Required a formidable Perception check to notice they're loaded on first roll, but difficulty decreases by 1 each subsequent roll.

gear.name: Marked Sabacc Deck
gear.description: Gain 1 boost to Deception checks when gambling. Noticing a deck is marked requires a Hard or Daunting Perception check depending on quality (higher quality costs double)

gear.name: Binders
gear.description: Handcuffs. Requires daunting athletics or coordination check to break free

gear.name: Comm Jammer
gear.description: Blocks wireless communications. Average computers check requires to cut through jamming, difficulty goes up with proximity and power.

gear.name: Comm Scrambler
gear.description: Encryption. Add 2 setback to attempts to decode and understand transmission

gear.name: Disguise Kit
gear.description: Gives user a good disguise

gear.name: Electronic Lock Breaker
gear.description: Can hack through most standard electronic locks. More expensive versions can get through better locks

gear.name: Restraining Bolt
gear.description: Shuts down or forces droid to do as controller wishes. PC droids can attempt daunting Discipline check to overcome effects

gear.name: Slicer Gear
gear.description: Various custom gear to hack all kinds of systems

gear.name: Lockpicking Tools
gear.description: Allows users to break physical locks

gear.name: Shift Coffer
gear.description: Can contain up to 5 encumbrance in items, but nothing with any dimension longer than 0.5m. When set in a niche in a wall, attempts to discover it require a formidable Perception check. Lock requires a hard Skulduggery check to break.

gear.name: Magna-Lock Safe
gear.description: Stores about 10 encumbrance. Cracking requires specialized tols and a formidable Skulduggery check

gear.name: Shadowcloak
gear.description: Hides wearer's identity, but once activated, wearer can't move around much without revealing itself. Can only operate for 1 hour before it must cool down and recharge for 4 hours. Discerning identifiable features of the wearer requires a daunting perception check.

gear.name: Fingerprint Masque
gear.description: Can fool basic fingerprint readers with easy Cool or Deception check. More advanced scanners require Average or Hard check. Daunting Perception check to notice physical presence of one.

gear.name: Forensics Investigation Kit
gear.description: Adds 1 automatic success to Perception checks to spot and gather evidence. May also count as the right tools for the job when making checks to analyze gathered evidence.

gear.name: MCI-100 Magnacuffs
gear.description: Required formidable Coordination check to escape bindings

gear.name: Thalassian Security Collar
gear.description: Slave collar. Removing without proper key requires a Daunting Skulduggery check. Wearer suffers 2 strain and 1 wound (ignores soak) on a failed check, and becomes disoriented for 5 rounds

gear.name: Explosive Shackles
gear.description: Removing without proper key requires a Daunting Skulduggery check. If check fails, shackles detonate, inflicting 10 wounds on wearer and each character in Engaged range (ignores soak)

gear.name: Dataspike
gear.description: Once per round, character can expend it to attempt ot disable a security program as a maneuver, this can include the use of Disable Security Program action. Reduce difficulty of subsequent Computers check to disable the program by 2, to a minimum of Simple.

gear.name: Ealewon A-212 Tracing Console
gear.description: Can be installed to monitor a single system. Computers checks to slice teh system suffer 1 setback. A defending slicer using the console gains 2 boost to Computers checks to identify any intruder.

gear.name: Signature Modulation Pad
gear.description: Add 2 setback to checks attempting to acquire the user's slicing signature.

gear.name: Crash Survival Kit
gear.description: Includes various emergency survival gear, e.g. thermal cloak, multipurpose knife, distress beacon, emergency comlinks, wire spool, ration bars, emergency medpac, respirators, water filter and jug, glow rod, high streingth microfiber, ration packs, flare gun. Might also inclue small blaster

gear.name: Ration Pack
gear.description: Each pack is equivalent to 1 meal

gear.name: Breath Mask/Respirator
gear.description: Allows user to breathe in otherwise unbreathable environments

gear.name: Space Suit
gear.description: Suit for being in space

gear.name: Tent
gear.description: It's a tent.

gear.name: Thermal Cloak
gear.description: Allows user to remove up to 2 setback from any checks to resist extreme temperatures

gear.name: Elysium Model 2 Atmospheric Processor
gear.description: Basically an atmospheric terraformer the size of a starcruiser

gear.name: GX-8 Water Vaporator
gear.description: Produces 1-3 litres of water

gear.name: Fasclean Atmospheric Reactive Dampener
gear.description: CO2 Scrubbers

gear.name: A99 Custom Biome Generator
gear.description: Does what it says on the box

gear.name: CN-15 Camouflage Netting
gear.description: Adds automatic 2 failure to all checks made to detect items concealed by it. One roll of netting can conceal one object up ot Silhouette 2, two rolls can conceal up to Silhouette 3, three rolls can conceal up to Silhouette 4. Also works against electronic scans.

gear.name: CN-21 Camouflage Paint
gear.description: Adds automatic 1 failure to all checks made to detect items concealed by it. Only works on items or individuals of Silhouette 1 or smaller.

gear.name: Imperial Army Canteen
gear.description: Holds 1.5L of water and includes built-in filtration

gear.name: Scout 5 Field Goggles
gear.description: Just plain-old goggles

gear.name: Imperial Army Field Rations
gear.description: Same as regular ration pack, but 1 ration can last 1 week

gear.name: Fire Paste
gear.description: Light things on fire. On its own, burns for 1 hour.

gear.name: Food Preparation System
gear.description: It's a hot plate.

gear.name: CX-2000 Holographic Ghillie Suit
gear.description: +1 difficulty to all checks to locate wearer, as long as he remains immobile

gear.name: Tauntaun Pup Tent
gear.description: Those inside can ignore temperatures up to -20 (assuming F because american)

gear.name: Synthrope (20m)
gear.description: It's rope.

gear.name: Electro-snare
gear.description: Survival check to place, opposed Perception check to avoid. 10 Stun Damage (+2 per success on Survival check)

gear.name: Portable Survival Shelter
gear.description: Collapsible 1 person shelter that has everything you need to survive outdoors.

gear.name: Electric Perimeter Fence
gear.description: Creates a fence of crackling energy. Anyone coming in contact with the fence beams suffers the effects of a stun grenade

gear.name: PED-21 Distress Beacon
gear.description: Lasts up to 72 hours. Message can be picked up from low orbit or many kilometers away. 2 boost to Perception, Computers, Surveillance checks to anyone searching for someone with an active beacon

gear.name: Field Kitchen
gear.description: Takes 30 minutes to set up. 2 boost to Survival and Knowledge (Education) checks to work with food

gear.name: Viscera Field Dressing Kit
gear.description: Tools for butchering animals. 1 boost to Survival checks to harvest meat/bones/organs from prey animals

gear.name: Condenser Unit
gear.description: Can either condense moisture (holds 2L), or be used as a smokeless grill. Can gather enough water each day to sustain one person, battery lasts 6 months

gear.name: Portable Power Generator
gear.description: Can recharge equipment iwth a maneuver, or droids/larger things in an hour. Character next to one can ignore an "out of ammo" result. Usually not depleted by such use.

gear.name: Pretormin Plastent
gear.description: 4 person tent. Removes 2 setback from checks to resist hostile temperatures while sleeping, and downgrades difficulty of such checks once

gear.name: Backpack
gear.description: Increase user's encumbrance threshold by 4

gear.name: Climbing Gear
gear.description: User can climb otherwise unclimbable things

gear.name: Datapad
gear.description: Basically a tablet

gear.name: Emergency Repair Patch
gear.description: Stimpack for droids. Heals 3 wounds, can use 5 per day (no diminishing heal)

gear.name: Extra Reloads
gear.description: Reloads for guns. Maneuver to reload

gear.name: Fusion Lantern
gear.description: Provides light and heat in the surrounding area. Can also power small electronic devices

gear.name: Glow Rod
gear.description: Flashlight

gear.name: Jet Pack
gear.description: User can function as a silhouette 1, speed 2, handling 0, system strain 3 vehicle that functions in atmosphere, and requires piloting (planetary) to operate

gear.name: Tool Kit
gear.description: Required for most mechanics checks. Tools can be used as improvised weapons. Can also be used as medpac for droids

gear.name: Utility Belt
gear.description: Increase characther's encumbrance threshold by 1

gear.name: Mercantiler Datapad
gear.description: When used within region for which it's programmed, grants 1 boost to any Negotiation checks made to buy/sell goods

gear.name: Thunderhead Portable Entertainment System
gear.description: Equipment to put on a concert

gear.name: Model 58 Concealment Holster
gear.description: +1 setback to Perception checks to discover concealed weapon. Can only hold light blaster pistols or holdout blasters

gear.name: Imperial Army Entrenching Tool
gear.description: Shovel. Counts as improvised melee weapon that does +2 damage, crit 4, and doesn't break on threat or despair

gear.name: Military Belt Pouch
gear.description: Can hold 2 items of Encumbrance 0. These can be drawn as an incidental.

gear.name: Imperial Army Military Pack
gear.description: Backpack increases user's encumbrance capacity by 6, but has Cumbersome 2

gear.name: MicroData P-2 Pocket Attaché
gear.description: Highly secure PalmPilot. Requires Daunting Computers check to slice. On failed check, data is wiped forever

gear.name: Savior Anti-grav Chute
gear.description: Parachute. User takes no damage or strain from falls, but falls slowly.

gear.name: EVA Powersuit
gear.description: Space suit for repairs and stuff. Wearer can fly in 0g and takes no penalties for it. Counts as having a tool kit for making repairs.

gear.name: CZ-88 Heavy Loader Arm
gear.description: Can perform checks to heft objects as if it has an Atheltics skill of 1 and Brawn of 5. Can be installed onto a vehicle of Silhouette 3 or larger as an attachment, using 1 hard point.

gear.name: Mechanical Dianoga
gear.description: Removes 2 setback from checks to remove system strain from starships and vehicles.

gear.name: VX-A Intelligent Toolbox
gear.description: Counts as a tool kit, and reduces time required for repairs, crafting, and other Mechanics related tasks by 50%

gear.name: OR-Series Tech Recycling Station
gear.description: Character using it adds 2 boost to Perception and Mechanics checks to scavenge parts or raw materials, and can complete such checks in half the time. Can also recover supplies worth half the material price from failed crafting checks.

gear.name: Repulsor Clamp
gear.description: Can hold a single object of 10 encumbrance or less aloft. Having one on hand removes 1 setback from checks to repair hull trauma and critical hits on starships and vehicles

gear.name: Bioscan
gear.description: Scanning an area for life signs gets 1 boost to any Perception checks opposing Stealth. Using it to verify a person's identity requires average Computers check and a biometric identifier for comparison.

gear.name: HoloNet Homing Beacon
gear.description: Allows user to track target so long as the beacon remains active

gear.name: Rocket Boots
gear.description: Allow user to function as a Silhouette 1, Speed 1, Handling -3 System Strain 3 vehicle that can only operate in atmosphere. Requires Piloting (Planetary) to operate. Boots suffer 1 system strain at end of each round

gear.name: Tracker's Goggles
gear.description: Grants 1 boost to wearer's Perception checks to locate a target by sight. Remove 2 setback imposed due to concealment, darkness, or fog/mist from Ranged (Light) and Ranged (Heavy) checks

gear.name: Mk. IV Modular Backpack
gear.description: +3 max Encumbrance. Can be equipped with up to 3 extra pouches

gear.name: Modular Backpack Extra Pouch
gear.description: +1 max Encumbrance

gear.name: Beast Call
gear.description: Plays back animal noises. Can also record sounds for later playback. Creatures make average Discipline check to resist being called to it. Average Computers check needed to record new sounds

gear.name: "Quickflash" Burning Gel
gear.description: When applied, quickly burns through any substance, in any environment. Commonly used to gain access to doors/hatchways/etc. that are otherwise inaccessible. Contact with the gel acts like a weapon with Dam 10, Burn 5, Pierce 5.

gear.name: Beastmaster Chem Lure
gear.description: Like the Beast Call but with pheromones (no recording). Requires a hard Discipline check to resist.

gear.name: Excavator's Precision Tool Kit
gear.description: Basically an archeology toolkit.

gear.name: Surveyor's Bag
gear.description: +2 max Encumbrance

gear.name: Spacer's Duffel
gear.description: +2 max Encumbrance, but have Cumbersome 3

gear.name: Specimen Containers (tiny)
gear.description: Contains specimens. Encumbrance capacity 1

gear.name: Specimen Containers (small)
gear.description: Encumbrance capacity 3-5

gear.name: Specimen Containers (medium)
gear.description: Encumbrance capacity 5-10

gear.name: Specimen Containers (large)
gear.description: Encumbrance capacity 10-15

gear.name: Holo V Audio/Visual Translator
gear.description: Fancy translation datapad that can do real-time translation and attempt to decipher and translate unknown languages. 1 boost to Knowledge (Lore) and Intellect checks to decipher/translate ancient languages

gear.name: AG/l Mk. III Targeting Goggles
gear.description: Wearer counts target's Silhouette as 1 higher for Gunnery checks against ships/vehicles

gear.name: Custom Tool Kit
gear.description: Owner gets 1 boost to any check to maintain/repair anything. Character trying to use someone else's kit get 1 setback instead.

gear.name: Workshop Manual
gear.description: Having correct manual downgrades difficulty of checks to maintain/repair vehicle/starship

gear.name: Avabush spice
gear.description: Character can only update 1 ability die to proficiency on any given check. If trying to lie or conceal the truth, 1 difficulty die upgraded to challenge

gear.name: Booster blue
gear.description: Character may upgrade 1 ability die on any Agility, Intellect, or Cunning related check. Effects last one scene/encounter. Character cannot remove strain at the end of any scene/encounter in which he uses it.

gear.name: Death sticks
gear.description: Cigarettes. Add 1 setback to anything character attempts during scene/encounter.

gear.name: Glitterstim
gear.description: Highly addictive. Character adds 3 boost to all Perception and Vigilance checks for current scene. Some users report gaining temporary telepathic abilities.

gear.name: Lesai
gear.description: A character using it at least once every 24 hours does not need to sleep, and suffers no penalties for lack of sleep. After any 8 hour period without stressful activities (e.g. combat). Leaves odd purple stains where it's applied. After going 24 hours without a dose, character finds it difficult to stay awake until receiving another does, or sleeping. Some Imperial officials claim that it turns users into amoral monsters without feelings or compassion.

gear.name: Yarrock
gear.description: Lasts one scene. Character is not required to make any fear checks, and counts as succeeding automatically. Once used, character must add 1 setback to any WIllpower or Presence related  checks for the remainder of the session.

gear.name: Impact
gear.description: Lasts 1 encounter. User can upgrade any Agility-based checks. After effects wear off, character suffers 1 setback to any Agility, Cunning, or Intellect-based checks for remainder of session.

gear.name: Muon Gold
gear.description: Lasts 1 encounter. User adds 1 boost to all Cunning and Presence based checks. Repeated use can impose temporary or lasting 1 setback to Intellect and Cunning based checks.

gear.name: Nala Tree Frog (12)
gear.description: Hutts like them

gear.name: Marcan Herb
gear.description: Basically hookah

gear.name: Ryll
gear.description: 1 dose allows user to ignore one easy or average critical injury until end of scene/combat, 2 doses allows user to ignore one hard critical injury until end of scene/combat. Once effects end, user suffers effects of the injury as normal, and also suffers 2 setback on all check for remainder of session

gear.name: Gunjack Spice
gear.description: Increases user's Brawn by 1 until end of scene/encounter. Each dose upgrades difficulty of Agility, Intellect, and Cunning related checks once until end of session

gear.name: Neutron Pixie
gear.description: Grants user automatic 2 Advantage on Agility and Willpower related checks until end of encounter. Once effects end, character suffers automatic 1 Threat on all Brawn, Intellect, and Cunning Related checks for remainder of session

gear.name: Corellian Whiskey
gear.description: Fancy Whiskey

gear.name: Whyren's Reserve
gear.description: Really Fancy Whiskey

gear.name: Ji Rikknit
gear.description: No real effects, but anyone who tries it must make an Easy Resilience check or gain a 1 value Addiction Obligation

gear.name: Nannarium Root
gear.description: User may upgrade the ability of any Intelligence or Cunning related check once, though doing so causes them to suffer 2 strain. Single dose lasts 1 hour.

gear.name: Ryshcate
gear.description: Corellian cakes that makes them feel all nostalgic

gear.name: Sleeppack
gear.description: Stimpack that puts people to sleep. Using on an aware and unwilling target requires hard Brawl or Melee check. Requires a hard Resilience check, failure inflicts 10 strain

gear.name: Sulfur Inhaler (10)
gear.description: Devaronian can use a maneuver to inhale 1 dose, suffering 2 strain and adding 1 boost to any Brawn or Agility checks until end of encounter. Useless for other species.

gear.name: Data Breaker
gear.description: Add 2 boost to any Computers check made to slice computers. Droids can have one installed internally.

gear.name: Flesh Camouflage Set
gear.description: Better disguise kit. Fools biometric scanners. Can mimick genetic sequence of a donor. Any checks made to ascertain user's true identity are formidable.

gear.name: Personal Stealth Field
gear.description: Renders user invisible. Stealth field can be prone to collapsing. Any check to ascertain the user's location by non-visual means is formidable.

gear.name: False Credentials
gear.description: Hard Computers check (or daunting Perception check without equipment) to recognize credentials as fake

gear.name: Skifter
gear.description: 1 boost to Skulduggery checks to cheat at gambling

gear.name: Cargo Scanner
gear.description: Average Computers check to increase available encumbrance of a vehicle/ship with silhouette of 3 or more by 10%

gear.name: Ardos Disk
gear.description: Identifies the bearer as being under the protection of the Hutts. On displaying one, character adds 2 boost to any Charm or Negotiation checks made with Hutts or their henchmen/servants. If showing the sigil of a rival clan, can upgrade difficulty of checks instead, though Hutts will avoid harming or hindering the bearer.

gear.name: Credit Cleaner
gear.description: Fancy money launderer. Formidable Computers check to trace money cleaned with it.

gear.name: Com-Scan
gear.description: User can triangulate location and movement of known comlink or transceiver with an average Computers check. Function out to Planetary Close range

gear.name: Holographic Disguise Matrix
gear.description: Creates visual hologram around user. User can effectively impersonate visual appearance of whomever the device has recorded. Adds 2 boost to Deception checks to imposonate, and 2 setback to Perception checks to detect the imposter.

gear.name: Saline Pump
gear.description: 1 boost to Clawdite's attempts to pass as another person using their species ability, 1 setback to checks against this. Non-clawdites get nothing from this
